snippet: In London, New York and other cities, demonstrators rallied after reports of mass killings in the city of Homs, Syria.
abstract: In London, New York and other cities, demonstrators rallied after reports of mass killings in the city of Homs, Syria.
lead_paragraph: As my colleagues Neil MacFarquhar and Anthony Shadid report, Russia and China vetoed a resolution before the United Nations Security Council, aimed at curbing violence in Syria. The vote came after reports of at least 200 deaths and hundreds more injuries as a result of shelling and machine-gun fire in the city of Homs.

headline.main: Violence in Syria Prompts Protests at Embassies
